channel.title: My Commands will not add in correctly someone tell me what is wrong

item.title: My Commands will not add in correctly someone tell me what is wrong
item.dc:creator: @LeechYourStuffPlease LeechYourStuffPlease
item.description:
@LeechYourStuffPlease wrote:

Added One Bracket will point to it with an arrow and it change the errors, I DID NOT PUT THE ERROR IN MY ACTUAL CODING AFTER I PASTED IT INTO HERE I PUT IT SO People are like well that arrow will mess everything up. I obviously know that.

	public void customCommand(String command) {
		actionAmount++;

if playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("owner yay"))
{

	if (command.startsWith("demote"))
		{  <--------------------------BRACKET HERE
		String name = command.substring(7);
		try {
		int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
		client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
		c.playerRights = 0;
		c.savemoreinfo();
		c.savechar();
		c.disconnected = true;
		sendMessage(name+" is no longer a member of staff");
		} catch(Exception e) {
		sendMessage(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist");
		}
	}

	public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) {
		if (amount > 0) {
			if (bankItems[fromSlot] > 0){
				if (!takeAsN

item.title: My Commands will not add in correctly someone tell me what is wrong
item.dc:creator: @LeechYourStuffPlease LeechYourStuffPlease
item.description:
@LeechYourStuffPlease wrote:

I cannot get any command to work I get 100 errors after I compile I ever tried just adding in 1 command at a time to try and diagnose the problem but the first command would not work aswell T.T
My Coding that is a little below my commands and a little above looks like this.
I know its only 1 command but I cannot get it to work.

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Member " +playerName+ " has logged out";
}
	}


	public void customCommand(String command) {
		actionAmount++;

if playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Mycharsname"))
{

	if (command.startsWith("demote"))
		String name = command.substring(7);
		try {
		int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
		client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
		c.playerRights = 0;
		c.savemoreinfo();
		c.savechar();
		c.disconnected = true;
		sendMessage(name+" is no longer a member of staff");
		} catch(Exception e) {
		sendMessage(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist");
		}
	}

	public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) {
		if (amount > 0) {
			if (bankItems[fromSlot] > 0){
				if (!takeAsNote) {
					if (Item.itemStackable[bankItems[fromSlot]+1]) {
						if (bankItemsN[fromSlot] > amount) {
							if (addItem((bankItems[fromSlot]-1),amount)) {
								bankItemsN[fromSlot] -= amount;
								resetBank();
								resetItems(5064);

I am getting an error when I start to compile at
